abstract: The Village Voice looks at ties between Rick Lazio and the former head of the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation, as Mr. Lazio won JPMorgan Chase nearly $1 billion in investments.
snippet: The Village Voice looks at ties between Rick Lazio and the former head of the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation, as Mr. Lazio won JPMorgan Chase nearly $1 billion in investments.
lead_paragraph: The story of Charles E. F. Millard (left), the controversial former head of the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation, has again popped into the news — only now, it has a political angle too.
